structure_sections.description: "İyi akşamlar değerli izleyenler" - The presenter, Hande Bayraktar, opens the broadcast and introduces the program, indicating that she will share the important headlines of the day.

"Siyasette Hemen başlayalım" - The news segment begins with a discussion on the critical agenda item in Turkish politics following local elections, focusing on President Erdoğan's upcoming special summit and the expected discussions regarding the new constitution and other political issues.
